headline: DIVIDEND ALERT! Dow Inc. (DOW) Snaps 3-Day Gains, Falls 17.4%
summary: We recently published Double-Digit Disaster: 10 Big Names Fall Off the Cliff. Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Thursday. Dow Inc. snapped a three-day winning streak on Thursday, dropping 17.45 percent to close at $25.07 apiece as investor sentiment was dampened by a dismal earnings performance in the second quarter of the […]

headline: What I Wish I Knew Before Investing In Dividend Stocks
summary: Dividend investing has been extremely rewarding for me. See here for 4 crucial and rarely discussed lessons from experiences in dividend investing.

headline: Dow: Expected 50% Dividend Cut, Now What?
summary: Dow faces significant headwinds, tariffs, and weak global demand. Is it a good time to buy the dip after the dividend cut and disappointing Q2 earnings? See more on DOW here.
